bibdata.title: American National Standard for Radiation Protection Instrumentation Test and Calibration, Portable Survey Instruments
American National Standard for Radiation Protection Instrumentation Test and Calibration, Portable Survey Instruments
bibdata.docidentifier: ANSI N323AB-2013 (Revision and Redesignation of ANSI N323A-1997 and ANSI N323B-2002)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Testing, calibration, and calibration frequency requirements for portable radiation detectors used to directly measure alpha, beta, photon, and neutron radiation are defined. Also defined are the calibration and testing requirements for alpha and beta-gamma measurements of surface contamination levels using portable radiation detectors. Portable radiation detectors may be battery or line powered.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
